items.name: CollaborationInviteAnyMesheryCloudUserOrAllMesheryUsers
items.feature: Invite any Meshery Cloud user, or all Meshery users, to work with you on a public design that control – including making changes and releasing new versions.

items.feature: Invite any Meshery Cloud user to work with you on a private design that control – including making changes and releasing new versions.

items.name: CollaborationMessageInRealTime
items.feature: Message in real-time, unattached to a specific design. Control who can pariticpate in the discussion.

items.name: CollaborationDiscussAnyDesignByLeavingReviewComments
items.feature: Discuss any design by leaving review comments or notes on a specific design. Control who has access, notify discussion participants with updates, and link from anywhere.

items.name: InfrastructureManagementManageCloudNativeInfrastructureLifeCycle
items.feature: This permission grants the user the ability to manage infrastructure life cycles within meshery. Meshery allows users to visualize, work on and manage various cloud native technologies.

items.name: InfrastructureManagementManageCloudNativeInfrastructureConfiguration
items.feature: Manage configuration for applications like EmojiVoto, HTTPBin, Image Hub, Istio Book Info

items.name: InfrastructureManagementApplyCloudNativeInfrastructureConfiguration
items.feature: Configure infrastructure with some predefined options like Automatic Sidecar injection, Envoy Filter, Policy

items.name: InfrastructureManagementValidateCloudNativeInfrastructureConfiguration
items.feature: Validate cloud native infrastructure  configuration against best practices like Analyze Running Configuration, SMI conformance

items.name: InfrastructureManagementApplyCustomCloudNativeConfiguration
items.feature: This permission grants the user the ability to apply custom configuration and customize existing configuration of thier cloud native infrastructure

items.name: InfrastructureManagementDeployCloudNativeInfrastructure
items.feature: This permission grants the user the ability to deploy their infrastructure to a cluster through Meshery. Meshery allows users to visualize, work on and manage various cloud native technologies

items.name: InfrastructureManagementUndeployCloudNativeInfrastructure
items.feature: This permission grants the user the ability to undeploy their infrastructure from a cluster through Meshery. Meshery allows users to visualize, work on and manage various cloud native technologies

items.name: InfrastructureManagementViewCloudNativeInfrastructure
items.feature: This permission grants the user the ability to view all cloud native infrastructure in Meshery. Meshery allows users to visualize, work on and manage various cloud native technologies.
